channel.title: Ens on goozenlab
channel.description: Recent content in Ens on goozenlab

item.title: Privacy Policy for Sati
item.author: jin@goozenlab.com (jin)
item.description: Privacy Policy sati will ask permission to access Health.app on your device. on Health.app sati will write its meditation data to Health: mindfulness. sati will not read/access other data on Health. Data in sati is used only within application. Default Setting for Export is OFF. can be switch on/off on Settings □■ with metta & be mindfull ■□

item.title: pranatice
item.author: jin@goozenlab.com (jin)
item.description: As a part of Yoga practice, pranayama is important exercise but is bit tedious practice. Usually people count for themselves to do. But it is cumbersome counting seconds for yourself and difficult to continue practice every day. This app helps to concentrate on practice by counting for you. (sounds little clerical though..) In between work, when you feel stressed,, when you wan to concentrate, when you want make your mind calm,, Practice pranayama. Main Display There are those item on display.

item.title: pinocul
item.author: jin@goozenlab.com (jin)
item.description: When you make (box) Pinhole Camera, you know the size of film but are not quite sure how thick you’re going to make. This softwear calculate the thickness of camera by choosing angle and size you’d like to make. ※ I’m not sure people are still making pinhole camera but… I hope this app helps..

item.title: (a)
item.author: jin@goozenlab.com (jin)

item.title: viriya
item.author: jin@goozenlab.com (jin)
item.description: You/I need to concentrate on task, but…. This timer helps to concentrate on thing needs to be done. it works fine with dash method (or other kinds). Main View ◇ Navigation Bar ・ + Button to add project ・DoubleTap/Swipe: Change List ◇ Cell ・Left Tap: Change Color of Bar ・Right Tap: Go to Task List

item.title: ohayo
item.author: jin@goozenlab.com (jin)
item.description: This is a simple clean little app for keeping a log of your sleep. You can see How long and When you sleep at a glance.This software helps you to find a way of good sleep. I hope at least you get some idea of your sleeping habit. □ Main View ◇ Timer: Start by Long-Tap on gray image area. 1：PreStart, show message (ex. take medicine!) 2：Start: show sleeping time. 3：WakeUp, show message (ex.drink a cup of water)

item.title: sati
item.author: jin@goozenlab.com (jin)
item.description: Simple and clean Meditation Timer/Logger for meditator, by meditator. available as free most of the time, become paid-version once a month for a couple of days. □ Main View ・“Long Tap” to start to meditate. ・Tap top sound line to toggle quiet mode. ・Tap center icon to go Setting View ・Tap Bar to go History View (Bar shows your recent

item.title: listaria
item.author: jin@goozenlab.com (jin)
item.description: This is simple shopping list application. Big letter is easy to read. Clean look of design. Simple to use. little memo feature is helpful and tap to show for a short second. 230 items are already registared. □ Shopping List Page This page is for look items on Shopping list. To add items on shopping list, you have to go to ListPage by clicking right “List” button on navigation bar. (order: Vegitable

item.title: doop
item.author: jin@goozenlab.com (jin)
item.description: It is software to figure out that we must make on a regular basis, such as the time to replace the battery, the things that event to cycle. □ List View ◇ Navigation Bar ・Plus mark in the upper right: Adding new entries ・Double tap/swipe: change of pages that have been sorted for each color Navigation bar(main) list of things in use Navigation bar(red) those in use in BarColor:red•Orange•Yellow•Gray Navigation bar(blue) those in use in BarColor:Yellow-green•Green•Blue•Gray Navigation bar(pink) those in use in BarColor:SkyBlue•Pink•Purple•Gray

item.title: ippuku
item.author: jin@goozenlab.com (jin)
item.description: This is a simple software to log your activities. How to Use ◇ Timer: start with + button on navigation bar ◇ on Cell ・Left tap: change date background color ・Right tap: change bar color on/off ・Center Double tap: delete or edit event ◇ on Navigation Bar ・Double tap: change List page (all, warm, cold, and soft color) ・Long tap: change view style (Default, 22:00 - 8:00, 5:00 - 19:30, 13:00 - 23:00) ※ There is indication on title with dot: (•title: am, title•: pm)

item.title: tapas
item.author: jin@goozenlab.com (jin)
item.description: Colorful and Simple Multiple Kitchen Timer with List. For noodle lovers Functions I wanted to add: ・List of items (I have many kinds of pastas/noodles/beans/etc) ・little memo ・multi timer ・record of date/times cooked ・simple design □ List View ◇ Navigation Bar ・DoubleTap/S

item.title: cosper
item.author: jin@goozenlab.com (jin)
item.description: is this worth $xxxx? This App calculates Simple Cost Efficiency to help to find out if product is worth for what you paid. You input Product name, price, date and how many time you have used, then list shows its cost per day or per use. □ Main View ◆ Navigation Bar ・Double Tap/Swipe: to Move around pages (sort by date, with star, Hot/Soft/Cool colors) ・Long Tap: Change sort within.

item.title: dandori
item.author: jin@goozenlab.com (jin)
item.description: Colorful post-it like Personal Project managing Application. Simple to work, fast, and fun to use. □ Project View ◇ Navigation Bar ・Button to add project ・DoubleTap/Swipe: Change List ◇ Cell ・Left Tap: Change Color of Bar ・Right Tap: Go to Task List ・Center DoubleTap: Edit ・Center LongTap: On/Off RedDot also register for AppBadge ・swipe to Delete ☆ Accesories Color Bar ・show Number of Tasks of the project ・Star and CutEdge ・White Dot: Color-Lock ・RedDot on Right: show if there is RedDot item in tasks

item.title: littlist
item.author: jin@goozenlab.com (jin)
item.description: Little List with Big Letter. Very easy & simple List/to-do app. It is pleasant and fun to use, and stimulate your Right Brain. You may like to tap-tap to make nice and colorful to-do page like picture of Mondrian.. □ Main View ◇ Navigation Bar ・DoubleTap/Swipe on NavBar: Change List ・Long Tap to go to Hot List (RedColor) ・Swipe-Up to go to DueDate List (Green) ◇ Cell ・Left Tap: Change color ・Right Tap: Change shade of gray ・Right LongTap: item goes up to the Top of List
